endpoint.description: Huggingface endpoint, in case of restricted access to Huggingface

lora_dir.description: Setup custom lora model dir, default is $DATA_DIR/lora if not provided

model_port.description: First model server port number, followings will increase by 1

models_dir.description: Setup custom model dir, default is $DATA_DIR/models if not provided

multi_process.description: If multiple process mode is turned on. If it is on, each model server will use independent process to make main process much more stable.
